GK19uddkokpu:133: yatra jñātvā kṛtanilayanāmindirāmātmakanyāṃ manye snehākulitahṛdayo vāhinīnāṃ vivoḍhā /
GK19uddkokpu:135: tatsaudhāgreṣvaruṇadṛṣadāṃ sāndrasindūrakalpaṃ tejaḥpuñjaṃ kisalayadhiyā carvituṃ mārabhethāḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:137: kṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭiṃ kathamapi tataḥ kautukānāṃ nidānād uḍḍīyethāḥ pathi viṭapināṃ puṣpamādhvīṃ lihānaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:138: hāraṃ hāraṃ madanapṛtanākāhalaiḥ kaṇṭhanādair utkaṇṭhānāṃ janapadamṛgīlocanānāṃ manāṃsi // Kok_1.69 //
GK19uddkokpu:139: brahmābhyāsapraśamitakalīn prāpya dīprān prakāśān śvetāraṇyaṃ vraja bahumataṃ dhāma mṛtyuñjayasya /
GK19uddkokpu:140: dṛṣṭvā dūre sakṛdapi janā yanna paśyantyavaśyaṃ mṛtyorvaktraṃ niṭilaghaṭitabhrūkuṭīkaṃ kadācit // Kok_1.70 //
GK19uddkokpu:142: yenākrānte sati giripatau loṣṭamānāsyacakraś cakrandādhaḥkṛtabhujavano rakṣasāṃ cakravartī // Kok_1.71 //
GK19uddkokpu:143: pārśve yasya pravahati nilā nāma kallolinī sā sandhyānṛttabhramiṣu patitā mastakājjāhnavīva /
GK19uddkokpu:144: nāvākṣetrapraṇayi ramayākrāntadormadhyamāste kūle yasyāḥ kuvalayadalaśyāmalaṃ dhāma kiñcit // Kok_1.72 //
GK19uddkokpu:145: sākaṃ kāntairmilati lalitaṃ keralīnāṃ kadambe matpreyasyāḥ priyasakha mahāmāghasevāgatāyāḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:146: pāyaṃ pāyaṃ mukhaparimalaṃ mohanaṃ yatra mattāḥ prāyo 'dyāpi bhramarakalabhā naiva jighranti padmān // Kok_1.73 //
GK19uddkokpu:147: śaivālaughacchuritakamalā saikatasraṃsihaṃsā nītā kārśyaṃ tapanakiraṇairvāsareṣveṣu sindhuḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:148: ākīrṇāsyāmalakanikaraiḥ śroṇivibhraṃśikāñcīṃ manye dīnāṃ virahadaśayā preyasīṃ me 'nuyāyāt // Kok_1.74 //
GK19uddkokpu:149: śāstā tasyā yadi taṭapathaiḥ śambarakroḍavāsī tiṣṭhannaśve javini mṛgayākautukī sañcareta /
GK19uddkokpu:150: lumpestasya śramajalakaṇān komalaiḥ pakṣavātair bhūyāt prītyai laghu ca samaye sevanaṃ hi prabhūṇām // Kok_1.75 //
GK19uddkokpu:151: sarvotkṛṣṭā jagati viditāḥ keraleṣu dvijendrā vallīkauṇyostadapi mahimā kāpi madhyaśritānām /
GK19uddkokpu:152: tatrāpyasyāḥ salilapavanā yatra yatra prathante teṣāṃ teṣāmatiśayajuṣaḥ śīlavidyānubhāvāḥ // Kok_1.76 //
GK19uddkokpu:153: īṣṭe teṣāṃ stutiṣu na guruḥ kā kathālpīyasāṃ no bhrātarbhūyaḥ śṛṇu parimitaṃ prastutādyāvaśeṣam /
GK19uddkokpu:154: tāmuttīrṇaḥ saritamamṛtasyandimākandavṛndān deśān pūtān pata guṇagaṇairnetranārāyaṇīyaiḥ // Kok_1.77 //
GK19uddkokpu:155: yaḥ prākpāṇigrahaṇasamaye śambhunā sānukampaṃ haste kṛtvā kathamapi śanairaśmapṛṣṭhe nyadhāyi /
GK19uddkokpu:156: draṣṭavyo 'sau kisalayamṛdurmuktipuryālayāyāḥ kātyāyanyā mahiṣamathanoḍḍāmaraḥ pādapadmaḥ // Kok_1.78 //
GK19uddkokpu:157: kiñcitpūrvaṃ raṇakhalabhuvi śrīmadadhyakṣayethās tanmīmāṃsādvayakulaguroḥ sadma puṇyaṃ maharṣeḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:158: vidvadvṛnde vivaditumanasyāgate yatra śaśvad- vyākhyāśālāvalabhinilayastiṣṭhate kīrasaṅghaḥ // Kok_1.79 //
GK19uddkokpu:159: śāstravyākhyā hariharakathā satkriyābhyāgatānām ālāpo vā yadi saha budhairākṣipedasya cetaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:160: tadvisrabdhadvijaparivṛte niṣkuṭādrau niṣaṇṇaḥ kokūyethāḥ sa khalu madhurāṃ sūktimākarṇya tuṣyet // Kok_1.80 //
GK19uddkokpu:161: ślāghyacchandasthitimayi mayā śobhane 'rthe niyuktaṃ śrāvyaṃ śabdaiḥ sarasasumanobhājamabhrāntavṛttim /
GK19uddkokpu:162: dūraprāptyā praśithilamiva tvāṃ sakhe kāvyakalpaṃ dhīmān paśyet sa yadi nanu te śuddha eva pracāraḥ // Kok_1.81 //
GK19uddkokpu:164: chindyustāpaṃ tava vṛṣapurīsaṅginaḥ śaṅkarāṅka- krīḍadgaurīkacataralanodgandhayo gandhavāhāḥ // Kok_1.82 //
GK19uddkokpu:165: pūrvo bhāgaḥ stanabharanataḥ prekṣyate ceccalākṣaḥ paścādbhāgo lalitacikuro dṛśyate no nitambī /
GK19uddkokpu:166: itthaṃ gauryā yugapadubhayaṃ draṣṭukāmo 'ṣṭamūrtir mūrtidvandvaṃ vahati bhagavān yaḥ sa muktyai niṣevyaḥ // Kok_1.83 //
GK19uddkokpu:168: maulau yasya druhiṇaśirasāṃ maṇḍalaṃ maṇḍapāntaḥ kṣmādevānāṃ śrutipadajuṣāṃ saṃśayānucchinatti // Kok_1.84 //
GK19uddkokpu:170: tasyādūre kanakabhavanaṃ pakṣapātāt praviṣṭaḥ sampanmūrtiṃ praṇama girijāṃ sā hi viśvasya mātā // Kok_1.85 //
GK19uddkokpu:171: saṃsarpadbhistanurucibharaiḥ saṅgamagrāmaśaures tāpiñchābhaiḥ stabakitatalaṃ gāhamāno vihāyaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:172: tulyacchāyasmṛtanavatamālāvalīvāsasaukhyo manye lokaiḥ kṣaṇamiva pṛthaṅno vibhāviṣyase tvam // Kok_1.86 //
GK19uddkokpu:173: kālīvāsaṃ bhaja pathi mahat kānanaṃ yatra śaśvat sevāyāte tridaśanikare śrāddhadevaupavāhyam /
GK19uddkokpu:174: bhūtairbhedyo balimahiṣa ityudbhaṭaiḥ kṛṣṭaśṛṅge rajjugrāhaṃ rudati vijayā rūḍhahāsaṃ ruṇaddhi // Kok_1.87 //
GK19uddkokpu:176: yatrāśliṣṭo varayuvatibhiścumbati svinnagaṇḍaṃ cūrṇīvātaḥ priya iva ratiśrāntamāsyāravindam // Kok_1.88 //
GK19uddkokpu:177: sā ca prekṣyā saridanupadaṃ yatra kalmāṣitāyāṃ majjanmāhodayapuravadhūkaṇṭhakastūrikābhiḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:178: raktāḥ padmāḥ kuvalayavanīsāmyamāpadyamānā vijñāyante sphuṭamahimadhāmodaye jṛmbhamāṇe // Kok_1.89 //
GK19uddkokpu:179: cārusvacchā śapharanayanā cakravākastanaśrīḥ kallolabhrūḥ kamalavadanā kamraśaivālakeśā /
GK19uddkokpu:180: saṃsevyā syāt sarasamadhurā sānukūlāvatīrṇair durgāhānyairiti hi saraṇiḥ kāpi gāmbhīryabhājām // Kok_1.90 //
GK19uddkokpu:181: tvayyākāśe subhaga taṭinīṃ lambamāne salīlaṃ bimbaṃ dṛṣṭvā payasi maṇibhaṅgāmale kampamānam /
GK19uddkokpu:182: vīcīvegapracaladasitāmbhojinīgucchabuddhyā kūjaṃ kūjaṃ madhuramalayaḥ kokila vyālaperan // Kok_1.91 //
GK19uddkokpu:183: tīraṃ tasyāḥ prati gatavato dakṣiṇaṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ te deśaḥ sarvātiśayivibhavo dṛkpathetaḥ pratheta /
GK19uddkokpu:184: tāṃ jānīyā diśi diśi jayantākhyayā khyāyamānāṃ pratyādiṣṭatridivanagaraprābhavāṃ prāpyabhūmim // Kok_1.92 //
GK19uddkokpu:186: ratnaśreṇīghaṭitaśikharairgopuraiḥ sā purī te prāyaḥ prajñābharaṇa sugamā syādanāveditāpi // Kok_1.93 //
GK19uddkokpu:189: pāthorāśestanumiva parāṃ manyamāno viśālāṃ yāmadhyāste sa khalu nigamāmbhojabhṛṅgo rathāṅgī // Kok_2.1 //
GK19uddkokpu:190: vaktraupamyaṃ vahati vimalaṃ paśya pārśve sudhāṃśoḥ paścādbhāgaṃ sumukhi ramaṇairitthamāvedyamānāḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:191: harmye yasyāṃ hariṇanayanāḥ kurvate 'smin kalaṅkaṃ dṛṣṭvā serṣyā iva kuvalayādhyeyaśobhairapāṅgaiḥ // Kok_2.2 //
GK19uddkokpu:193: yatrārabdhe dinakarakarairapyahārye 'ndhakāre lolākṣīṇāṃ bhavati divase nirviśaṅko 'bhisāraḥ // Kok_2.3 //
GK19uddkokpu:194: yasyāṃ rātrau yuvativadanāmbhojasaundaryacauryāt satyaṃ saudhadhvajapaṭaśikhāghṛṣṭabimbe himāṃśau /
GK19uddkokpu:195: dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ kiṇamaṇikaṇaṃ hanta gāḍhaṃ prarūḍhaṃ mūḍho loko vadati śaśako rohito 'nyattatheti // Kok_2.4 //
GK19uddkokpu:197: ghāsabhrāntyā gaganapadavīdīrghapānthāyamānāś cañcatprothaṃ taraṇituragāścarvituṃ prārabhante // Kok_2.5 //
GK19uddkokpu:198: yatrodyāne malinitadiśākuñjapuñje tarūṇāṃ śṛṅge lagnā bhramarapaṭalīnirviśeṣāḥ payodāḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:200: anyāmagre mama maṇigṛhe bhuktavānityavādīr mugdhe kānto dhṛtanakhapadā bhittilīnā kimeṣā /
GK19uddkokpu:201: itthaṃ yasyāṃ smitalavajuṣo hrepayante navoḍhāṃ sakhyastasyāstanumanupamāṃ bimbitāṃ darśayantyaḥ // Kok_2.7 //
GK19uddkokpu:202: cillīvalyā dhanuṣi ghaṭite kṣipta evekṣukāṇḍo netropānte vahati śaratāṃ nyastamevāravindam /
GK19uddkokpu:203: romāvalyāmapi guṇadaśāṃ yatra bimbādharāṇāṃ bibhrāṇāyāṃ madanavibhunā bhraṃśitaivālimālā // Kok_2.8 //
GK19uddkokpu:204: śṛṅgārābdhiplava iva galadveṇi kamprastanaṃ tat bhraśyannīvi sthitamiti viṭā vīkṣya saṃśliṣya yatra /
GK19uddkokpu:205: mugdhākṣīṇāṃ mukulitadṛśāṃ mohanāḍambarānte bhūyaḥ śrāntaṃ punarapi ratodyogamudvelayanti // Kok_2.9 //
GK19uddkokpu:206: yasyāṃ meghā harimaṇiśilāharmyaparyantabhājo na jñāyeran śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ cenna dadyuḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:208: tasyāṃ lakṣmīramaṇanilayaṃ dakṣiṇenekṣaṇīyaṃ matkāntāyāḥ sadanamabhito veṣṭitaṃ ratnasālaiḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:209: madhye saudhaṃ kanakaghaṭitaṃ bibhradūḍhacchadaughe yasminnambhoruha iva kanatkarṇike khelati śrīḥ // Kok_2.11 //
GK19uddkokpu:210: māhābhāgyaṃ ratipatibhujāḍambaraḥ paunaruktyāt kalyāṇaughaḥ sphurati rasikānantatāpyatra hīti /
GK19uddkokpu:211: eṣāmādyakṣaragaṇamupādāya baddhena nāmnā mānyaṃ mārakkaranilayanaṃ yatkavīndrā gṛṇanti // Kok_2.12 //
GK19uddkokpu:212: līlāvāpī lasati lalitā tatra sopānamārge māṇikyāṃśusphuraṇasatatasmeranālīkaṣaṇḍā /
GK19uddkokpu:213: yatrāyāntyāḥ payasi vimale snātumasmatpriyāyā manye yānābhyasanavidhaye mallikākṣā vasanti // Kok_2.13 //
GK19uddkokpu:214: tasyāstīre punarupavanaṃ tatra cūto 'sti potas tvajjatīyaiḥ pika parivṛtaḥ pallavāsvādalubdhaiḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:215: pārśve cāsya stabakanamitā mādhavīmugdhavallī preyasyā me pariṇayamahaṃ prāpitau sādaraṃ yau // Kok_2.14 //
GK19uddkokpu:216: tasyādūre maratakatale hemabaddhālavālaḥ sikto mūle himajalabharaiścampakaḥ kaścidāste /
GK19uddkokpu:217: labdhvā sakhyāstava sa sukṛtī smeravaktrābjarāgaṃ sūte tasyāstanulatikayā tulyavarṇaṃ prasūnam // Kok_2.15 //
GK19uddkokpu:218: krīḍānṛtte bhavanaśikhināṃ dūramuktāhisaṅgā sāndracchāyāhṛtaravikarā tatra pāṭīravāṭī /
GK19uddkokpu:219: madhye tasyāṃ sa khalu latikāmaṇḍapo ratnabhūmiḥ śaśvadyasmin kimapi valati smāvayoḥ premavallī // Kok_2.16 //
GK19uddkokpu:220: snigdhaskandhasrutamadhurasaḥ kiñca tasyopakaṇṭhe kūjadbhṛṅgaḥ kuravakataruryaḥ kuraṅgekṣaṇāyāḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:221: kāle kāle karikaraśirovibhramābhyāṃ bhujābhyām āśliṣṭāṅgo vahati mukulacchadmanā romabhedān // Kok_2.17 //
GK19uddkokpu:222: sthāneṣveṣu kvacana kathiteṣūtsukā puṣpaśayyām adhyāsīnā parijanakṛtāṃ sā na cedīkṣitā syāt /
GK19uddkokpu:223: prāsādo 'syāḥ paramabhimataḥ ko 'pi māhendranīlas tasmin dṛśyā taṭidiva ghane cārurūpā priyā me // Kok_2.18 //
GK19uddkokpu:224: sā netrāṇāmamṛtagulikā sṛṣṭisāro vidhātuḥ saundaryendoḥ prathamakalikā dīpikā bhūtadhātryāḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:225: kandarpasya tribhuvanavibhoḥ kāñcanī ketuyaṣṭiḥ śṛṅgārābdheḥ śaśadharakalā jīvitaṃ me dvitīyam // Kok_2.19 //
GK19uddkokpu:226: paśyannenāṃ bahalasuṣamāmaṇḍalāntarnimagnāṃ madhye 'nyāsāmapi caladṛśāṃ jñāsyase no kathaṃ tvam /
GK19uddkokpu:227: jyotsnājālasnapitabhuvanā tārakāṇāṃ samīpe cāndrī mūrtiḥ kathaya jagato jñāpyate kena rātrau // Kok_2.20 //
GK19uddkokpu:228: sāndrāmodastimiranikaraścandramā niṣkalaṅkaḥ śailau haimau bhramarapaṭalīkīlito vyomabhāgaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:229: kamraṃ cakraṃ mṛdukarikaradvandvamabje salīle sarvaṃ caitanmadanaghaṭitaṃ saumya sambhūya sābhūt // Kok_2.21 //
GK19uddkokpu:230: nīcīkurvantyalasavalitā netrapātāḥ kuraṅgān vīcīgarvaṃ harati nikhilaṃ vibhramāndolitā bhrūḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:231: pāṇī kalpadrumakisalayaprābhavaṃ na kṣamete vāṇī tasyā vahati bhavatāṃ pañcamairbālamaitrīm // Kok_2.22 //
GK19uddkokpu:232: sā kāntiśceddravati kanakaṃ tanmukhaṃ cet ka induḥ sā ced bimbādharamadhuratā tiktatāmeti mādhvī /
GK19uddkokpu:233: sā vā tasyā yadi tanulatā mālatī lohatulyā tau cedūrū kanakakadalīstambhayoḥ kvāpi ḍambhaḥ // Kok_2.23 //
GK19uddkokpu:234: ukteṣveva prasajati punarnavyalāvaṇyasāreṣv aṅgeṣvasyā mama kathayato hanta vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:235: tādṛgbhūte manasi vivaśe kinnu kurvīta seyaṃ yadyacceto vimṛśati girāṃ tattadevābhidheyam // Kok_2.24 //
GK19uddkokpu:236: adya prāyaḥ praṇayini mayi proṣite bhāgyadoṣāt kalpaprāyairahaha divasairebhirutkaṇṭhamānā /
GK19uddkokpu:237: sañjāyeta prabalavirahodvejitā peśalāṅgī mūrchadgharmajvaraparavaśā nīlakaṇṭhīva khinnā // Kok_2.25 //
GK19uddkokpu:238: yatrāpāṅgadyutikavacite kiñcidutsārya keśān dattaḥ premṇā dinamanu mayā dīrghikāraktapadmaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:239: tasminnasyā bhavati niyataṃ hanta cintākulāyā gaṇḍanyastaḥ karakisalayaḥ karṇajāhe 'vataṃsaḥ // Kok_2.26 //
GK19uddkokpu:240: pakṣmaspandaḥ samajani sakhe paśyatormāṃ yayoḥ prāṅ- niṣpatrākṛnmayi tu vidhinā tādṛśe dūranīte /
GK19uddkokpu:241: antarbāṣpacchuraṇanibhṛte sāmprataṃ te mṛgākṣyā netre dhattastuhinakaṇikādanturāmbhojadainyam // Kok_2.27 //
GK19uddkokpu:242: sāndrāmodaṃ sapaṭu sadayaṃ sasmaraṃ sānutarṣaṃ sambhogānte muhurapi mayā sādaraṃ cumbito yaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:244: krīḍāśailau madananṛpateḥ kāntipūrasya kokau syātāṃ tasyā dhruvamurasijau kiñcidāpāṇḍumūlau /
GK19uddkokpu:245: madviśleṣaḥ śaraduḍunibhāṃ tyājayan hāramālāṃ manye bhīto vitarati tayoraśrudhārābhiranyām // Kok_2.29 //
GK19uddkokpu:246: bhūṣāsvāsthāṃ yadapi jahatī tāṃ vahatyeva kāñcīṃ grāhaṃ grāhaṃ pṛthu pṛthu mayā mauktikaṃ gumbhitā yā /
GK19uddkokpu:247: śroṇībimbe sumahati tayā bhūṣite komalāṅgyāḥ sālāvītāṃ sa kila madano manyate rājadhānīm // Kok_2.30 //
GK19uddkokpu:249: ārabdhānāṃ hara hara mayā yatra saṃvāhanānāṃ nityaṃ jātā niravadhirasāḥ ke 'pi ke 'pyantarāyāḥ // Kok_2.31 //
GK19uddkokpu:250: ādvārāntaṃ madabhigamanāśaṅkayā cañcalākṣyā yātāyātaiḥ kisalayanibhau kliśyataḥ pādapadmau /
GK19uddkokpu:251: mithyāgotraskhalanamasakṛt prastutaṃ hanta yābhyāṃ labdhuṃ pādapraṇatiṣu mayā hanta santāḍanāni // Kok_2.32 //
GK19uddkokpu:252: yadyapyasyāḥ kraśayati vapurvallarīṃ dīpyamāno viśleṣāgnirdviguṇayati tāṃ kintu lāvaṇyalakṣmīm /
GK19uddkokpu:253: taptāṃ taptāṃ nayati nitarāṃ tānavaṃ jātavedā haimīṃ lekhāmapi tu janayatyeva varṇaprakarṣam // Kok_2.33 //
GK19uddkokpu:254: pṛthvīreṇūnalakanikare netrayorbāṣpapūraṃ haste gaṇḍaṃ sitabisalatāhārajālaṃ stanāgre /
GK19uddkokpu:255: śroṇyāṃ kṣaumaṃ malinamasṛṇaṃ sā vahatyeva hantety āstāmetadbahuvilapitairmāstu kālātipātaḥ // Kok_2.34 //
GK19uddkokpu:256: sthitvā cūte prathamakathite mugdhakāntādharābhaṃ daṣṭvā svairaṃ kisalayamatha prekṣaṇīyā tvayā sā /
GK19uddkokpu:257: pṛcchantī vā malayavapanaṃ praśrayānmatpravṛttiṃ madvṛttāntaṃ kathaya kaṭhinasyeti vā prārthayantī // Kok_2.35 //
GK19uddkokpu:258: chinte tāpaṃ himajalamayī cāndanī kinnu carcā mandaspandāḥ kimu sukhakarā mārutāścāmarāṇām /
GK19uddkokpu:259: pṛcchantīnāmiti savayasāṃ sātireke 'pi tāpe smitvā ramyaṃ sakalamiti vā cittamāśvāsayantī // Kok_2.36 //
GK19uddkokpu:260: praspandante malayapavanā rundhi jālaṃ kavāṭaiḥ śambhornāmnā śaragaṇamucaṃ bhīṣayeḥ pañcabāṇam /
GK19uddkokpu:261: jīvañjīvaṃ visṛja carituṃ candrike candrikāyām itthaṃ ceṭīṃ sajalanayanāmādiśantī muhurvā // Kok_2.37 //
GK19uddkokpu:262: prāptālambā parijanakaraiḥ prāpya vā citraśālāṃ mugdhā svasyāścaraṇapatitaṃ veti taṃ māṃ nirīkṣya /
GK19uddkokpu:263: ehyuttiṣṭha priya na kupitāsmīti bāṣpākulākṣī gāḍhāśleṣapracalitakarā rudhyamānā sakhībhiḥ // Kok_2.38 //
GK19uddkokpu:264: kopaṃ caṇḍi tyaja parijane daivamatrāparāddhaṃ yenākāṇḍe samaghaṭi mahānāvayorviprayogaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:265: itthaṃ baddhāñjali kṛtaruṣaṃ bhāvitāmagratastāṃ sāhaṃbhūtā priyacaṭuśatairudyatā vānunetum // Kok_2.39 //
GK19uddkokpu:267: antargehaṃ jaladaśakalairāvṛto rohitāṅkaḥ kenānītaḥ pura iti bhiyā vyāharantī sakhīrvā // Kok_2.40 //
GK19uddkokpu:268: nidrāṃ prāptā kathamapi cirāttatra cālokinī māṃ śūnyāśleṣaṃ viracitavatī hanta ghātāt kucādryoḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:269: nirbhindānā nijakaradhṛtaṃ kaṅkaṇaṃ srastaśeṣaṃ paśyantīnāṃ nayanakamale badhnatī vā sakhīnām // Kok_2.41 //
GK19uddkokpu:270: vakti dhvāṅkṣaḥ suhṛdupagamaṃ dakṣiṇe kṣīravṛkṣe vāmaṃ netraṃ sphurati sucirāducchvasityadya cetaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:271: kiñca svānaḥ śravaṇamadhuro jāyate kokilānāṃ prāṇeṣvāśāmiti kathamapi bhrātarābadhnatī vā // Kok_2.42 //
GK19uddkokpu:272: muktvā jīvāmyasusamamiti vrīlitā vismitā vā tatsaṅgāśā punariha paraṃ heturityāsitā vā /
GK19uddkokpu:273: śocantī māṃ dayitamathavā viprayogāsahiṣṇuṃ strīṇāṃ ceṣṭāsviti hi virahotthāsu diṅmātrametat // Kok_2.43 //
GK19uddkokpu:274: gāḍhāśleṣavyatikararasagranthanādūyamānaḥ sambhogānte svapanavidhaye yaḥ purā dhūyate sma /
GK19uddkokpu:275: kaṇṭhotsaṅgānmama sa vidhinā vairiṇā dūrakṛṣṭo vāmo bāhustvayi savidhage yāsyati spandamasyāḥ // Kok_2.44 //
GK19uddkokpu:276: vakturvaktraṃ tamasi bhavato naiva dṛśyeta rātrāv āmadhyāhnaṃ bhavati niyamavyākulā vāsare sā /
GK19uddkokpu:277: sahyasparśe sati ravikare tāmasahyasmarārtiṃ matsandeśaṃ maṇivalabhikāmāśritaḥ śrāvayethāḥ // Kok_2.45 //
GK19uddkokpu:278: tyaktvā cūtānapi kusumitānāgato matsamīpaṃ kinnveṣa syāt kamapi kuśalodantamākhyātukāmaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:279: ityālībhirbhṛtajalakaṇaṃ pāṇināmṛṣṭanetraṃ dṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭākṣaramiti śanaiḥ śaṃsituṃ prakramethāḥ // Kok_2.46 //
GK19uddkokpu:280: amlānā te jayati kamanīyāṅgi maṅgalyabhūṣā patyuḥ pārśvāt suhṛdahamupeto 'smi sandeśahāraḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:281: jātaṃ viddhi śrutisukhagirāṃ kokilānāṃ kule māṃ ye pañceṣoḥ kimapi pathikākarṣaṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhamastram // Kok_2.47 //
GK19uddkokpu:282: coleṣvāste sumukhi kuśalī tvatpriyaḥ pṛcchati tvāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ bhajati bhavatītyāttavācaṃ bhavantam /
GK19uddkokpu:283: bhūyobhūyaḥ kathaya kathayetyālapantyaśrumiśraiḥ prītismerairmadiranayanā mānayiṣyatyapāṅgaiḥ // Kok_2.48 //
GK19uddkokpu:284: evaṃ brūyāḥ punarajani yaḥ premakope mitho vāṃ jāte maune capalacapalastatkṣaṇaṃ pūrvamuktyām /
GK19uddkokpu:285: tādṛkpremṇaściravirahiṇaḥ prāṇanāthasya vāṇī seyaṃ mattaḥ śravaṇasarasā śrūyatāṃ śrāvyabandhā // Kok_2.49 //
GK19uddkokpu:286: kalyāṇāṅgi priyasahacarīṃ tvāmanāsādayadbhir bāhyairakṣaiḥ saha paramahaṃ yāmi kāmapyavasthām /
GK19uddkokpu:287: dhanyaṃ cetaḥ punaridamahorātramanyānapekṣaṃ tvayyāmagnaṃ bata nanu pṛthagbhāgyamapyekajānām // Kok_2.50 //
GK19uddkokpu:288: mādyadbhṛṅgaiḥ kumudapavanaistarjyamānasya ghorair ātaṅkākhye sarasi luṭhato hā niśīthe niśīthe /
GK19uddkokpu:289: nidrāmūke jagati rudati śvāsacintājuṣo me saṅkrandantaścaṭulanayane cakravākāḥ sahāyāḥ // Kok_2.51 //
GK19uddkokpu:290: mohādvaitaṃ viharati dhṛtirlīyate jāḍyamīne bhātyunmādo bhramati matirityādi so 'haṃ na vedmi /
GK19uddkokpu:291: bāṇaṃ muñcan parisaracaro na svapan nāpi khādan kṛtsnaṃ jānātyalasagamane kevalaṃ pañcabāṇaḥ // Kok_2.52 //
GK19uddkokpu:292: kāle cāsmin kanadalibhṛtaḥ kampitāgrapravālāḥ kamrā vallyaḥ kimapi marutā cumbitā dakṣiṇena /
GK19uddkokpu:293: kiñciddaṣṭādharakisalayāṃ prāṅmayā bhogakāle sītkurvāṇāṃ dhutakaratalāṃ tvāṃ priye smārayanti // Kok_2.53 //
GK19uddkokpu:294: aṃsālambiślathakacabharaṃ hastaruddhāmbarāntaṃ prākkrīḍānte tava maṇigavākṣopakaṇṭheṣu cāram /
GK19uddkokpu:295: smāraṃ smāraṃ kathamapi mayā muhyatā sahyate 'sau mando vāyuḥ sutanu bakulodbhedasaurabhyabandhuḥ // Kok_2.54 //
GK19uddkokpu:296: tīrtvā rātriṃ virahamahatīṃ tīvratāpāṃ kathañcid dṛṣṭvā bhānoḥ kiraṇamaruṇaṃ jambhaśatrordigante /
GK19uddkokpu:297: pratyudyāntīṃ tvaritamabalāṃ śliṣyate bhāgyasīmne sāraṅgākṣi spṛhayati mano hanta cakrākhyayūne // Kok_2.55 //
GK19uddkokpu:298: utkaṇṭho 'smi tvaduditadhiyā mugdhahaṃsīnināde tvadbhūṣāyāṃ hariti satataṃ locane pātayāmi /
GK19uddkokpu:299: tvatsaṃspṛṣṭe mama ca vapuṣi prema badhnāmi kānte satyaṃ prāṇānapi paramahaṃ tvatpriyān dhārayāmi // Kok_2.56 //
GK19uddkokpu:300: tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca kṣitimupagatāvityaviśleṣacintā nindāvantau smara iti mitho vākyasambhedasaukhyam /
GK19uddkokpu:301: spṛśyete nau niśi śaśikarairaṅgake yaugapadyāt tenāpyasti dviradagamane satyamāśleṣabuddhiḥ // Kok_2.57 //
GK19uddkokpu:302: hāhantāsminnasulabhamithodarśane viprayoge saivālambo mama bhagavatī bhāvanākalpavallī /
GK19uddkokpu:303: tvāmāsīnāmasakṛdanayā gāḍhamāliṅgya rāgād aṅkārūḍhāmalaghujaghane nocitaṃ vaktumanyat // Kok_2.58 //
GK19uddkokpu:304: jātaṃ ceto madanasubhaṭasyādya yogyaṃ śaravyaṃ naikacchidraṃ niyatamamutaḥ subhru vibhraṃśi dhairyam /
GK19uddkokpu:305: kālāt kṣīṇe punaravayave vardhate kevalaṃ no tāpastīvrasmarahutabhujā tasya varṇodgamo 'pi // Kok_2.59 //
GK19uddkokpu:306: evaṃprāyā na hi na virahe jīvituṃ santyupāyāḥ satyaṃ taistaiḥ kṛtadhṛtirahaṃ prāṇimi prāṇanāthe /
GK19uddkokpu:307: niścityaivaṃ nirupamaguṇe sāhasebhyo nivṛttā tvaṃ ca snānādiṣu savayasāṃ prārthanāṃ mā niṣedhīḥ // Kok_2.60 //
GK19uddkokpu:308: tīrṇaprāyo virahajaladhiḥ śailakanyāprasādāc cheṣaṃ māsadvitayamabale sahyatāṃ mā viṣīda /
GK19uddkokpu:309: dhūpodgāraiḥ surabhiṣu tato bhīru saudhāntareṣu krīḍiṣyāvo navajaladharadhvānamandrāṇyahāni // Kok_2.61 //
GK19uddkokpu:310: kacciccitte sphurati capalāpāṅgi cūrṇyāṃ kadācit srastottaṃsaṃ dhavalanayanaṃ dhautabimbādharoṣṭham /
GK19uddkokpu:311: snānānte te mukhamupasakhi prekṣamāṇe mayi drāg- vakṣodaghne payasi punarapyāvayormajjanaṃ tat // Kok_2.62 //
GK19uddkokpu:312: āśliṣyantaṃ viṭapabhujayā tatra vallīranekāḥ krīḍārāme kamapi taruṇaṃ vīkṣya mākandavṛkṣam /
GK19uddkokpu:313: sācīkṛtya sphuradadharayā caṇḍi vaktraṃ bhavatyā subhrūbhaṅgaḥ sajalakaṇikaḥ preṣito mayyapāṅgaḥ // Kok_2.63 //
GK19uddkokpu:314: pratyākhyātaḥ praṇayini ruṣā bimbito 'haṃ stane te sairandhryajñā sthagayitumabhūccandanena pravṛttā /
GK19uddkokpu:315: mā pāṭīraṃ pulakini punaścātra limpeti śaṃsaty ālīvṛnde smitajuṣi kṛtā dṛktvayā vrīlagarbhā // Kok_2.64 //
GK19uddkokpu:316: uccinvatyāḥ kisalayarucā pāṇinodyānapuṣpaṃ sākaṃ bhṛṅgaistava mayi mukhāmbhojasaurabhyalubdhe /
GK19uddkokpu:317: reṇutrastā iva sumanasāṃ dakṣiṇāḥ kelisakhyaḥ kañcitkālaṃ karakisalayairapyadhurlocanāni // Kok_2.65 //
GK19uddkokpu:318: ityetasmānmama kuśalitāṃ viddhyabhijñānadānād bhūyaścaikaṃ śṛṇu sahacarīṃ dhūtanaikānunītim /
GK19uddkokpu:319: kelīhaṃse smarajuṣi haṭhāccumbatīṣatstanantīṃ tvaṃ tu smṛtvā kimapi bahalavrīlamālokathā mām // Kok_2.66 //
GK19uddkokpu:320: rāgo nāma truṭati viraheṇeti lokapravādas tvatsambaddho mama śataguṇaḥ saṅgamādviprayoge /
GK19uddkokpu:321: so 'yaṃ bhedo viṣayabhidayā saṅgame tvaṃ kilaikā viśleṣe tu tribhuvanamidaṃ jāyate tvanmayaṃ hi // Kok_2.67 //
GK19uddkokpu:322: etatkṛtyaṃ priyasakha mama bhrāturārtasya kṛtvā nāsīraḥ syā jagati karuṇāśālināṃ saṃvibhāge /
GK19uddkokpu:323: śaṃsanti tvāṃ nanu parabhṛtaṃ śaiśave yadbhṛto 'nyaiḥ patrivrātābharaṇa bharaṇenādya sa tvaṃ pareṣām // Kok_2.68 //
GK19uddkokpu:324: evaṃ tasyā virahavidhuraṃ jīvitaṃ sthāpayitvā gaccha svecchāviharaṇa yathāprārthitaṃ digvibhāgam /
GK19uddkokpu:325: mānyaśrīḥ syānmadananṛpateḥ kokilā te 'nukūlā bhūyānmaivaṃ sakṛdapi tayā viprayogaprasaṅgaḥ // Kok_2.69 //
